content.webTitle: Chrysalis sells books publisher in £12m buyout

fields.headline: Chrysalis sells books publisher in £12m buyout
fields.bodyText: Chrysalis Group, owner of the Heart 106.2FM and LBC radio stations in London, is in talks to sell off its books division in a £12.5m management buyout. The media group said the business had reported "extremely disappointing" full-year results and writedowns related to the sale would create a significant exceptional loss. Richard Huntingford, chief executive of Chrysalis, said the deal would allow the group to start its new financial year, which runs from August, in "the right strategic shape". "It closes a chapter and one that has not been a happy experience for us," he said.
